text: TL;DR: If something on our site looks broken, try disabling your ad blocker and refresh the page. We've recently become aware that some ad blockers are interfering with some of the visualizations and widgets on our site. We tracked the root of the issue to a recent change in one of the most popular ad block lists – we contacted the list maintainer and the problem was quickly resolved. But the fix takes a bit to reach everyone, which is why the issue persisted as long as it did. Anyway, everything should work fine now. Lastly, if you’d like to support us, consider whitelisting our site in your ad blocker altogether. Ads help us stay independent - none of our reviews are sponsored - and they fund all the content you enjoy here. Thanks for being part of our community!
html:
TL;DR: If something on our site looks broken, try disabling your ad blocker and refresh the page.

We've recently become aware that some ad blockers are interfering with some of the visualizations and widgets on our site.

We tracked the root of the issue to a recent change in one of the most popular ad block lists – we contacted the list maintainer and the problem was quickly resolved. But the fix takes a bit to reach everyone, which is why the issue persisted as long as it did. Anyway, everything should work fine now.

Lastly, if you’d like to support us, consider whitelisting our site in your ad blocker altogether. Ads help us stay independent - none of our reviews are sponsored - and they fund all the content you enjoy here.

Thanks for being part of our community!
